summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Fifteenth Avenue Sixteenth Avenue North from South side of East Prospect to South side of East Galer et al, in the City of Seattle, by paving same with asphalt, under Ordinance No. 13200, creating Local Improvement District No. 1190 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
